name: BasketBros.io
description:
Soar through the air and dunk all over the place in this frenzied io basketball game!

Grab the opening tip, take it the length of the court and shoot the 3 or throw it down and turn your bros into scrubs!

Just like the smash hit web game, BasketBros.io is a side scrolling game where you hoop vs great opponents. Pick the high flying Zane Willow and soar for dunks, or choose Steph Flurry and his deadly 3 point arsena!

TOTALLY UNREALISTIC GRAPHICS AND GAMEPLAY

Who wants to be constrained by reality anyway? Do you want to jump two feet off the ground? Or would you rather SKY for a MASSIVE JAM!


CHOOSE FROM A VARIETY OF CHARACTERS

Each character in BasketBros.io has his own unique abilities. As you WIN, you get to UNLOCK MORE BROS for even more slam jamming FUN! Can you unlock them all? Can you WIN with them all?


KEY FEATURES

Fun side-scrolling gameplay.


Totally unrealistic 2D graphics and animation.

VERY VERY easy to learn and play.

Elbow your opponent and knock him out! Foul? No way! The raf saw NOTHING!

12 unlockable bros, each with diffewrent stats.


Easy rebounding and fun tip dunks. OBLITERATE YOUR BROS AT THE RIM!


Free to play with NO IN APP PURCHASES!!! Did we say free? No pay2win here, bro!

-- Download BasketBros.io from Blue Wizard now! --
